head.title: Rearrange {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to quickly reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Process PDFs, Word, Excel, PowerPoint files, images, and more with ease.

header.title: Rearrange pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables {{EnvNameShort}} applications to modify page order in {{FileFormatUp}} documents effortlessly.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile document processing tool that supports more than 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. It provides features for merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and removing pages.

more_features.title: Advanced document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a wide range of features to help you handle over 50 popular business document formats efficiently.

feature_1.title: Merge documents of different formats
feature_1.content: Combine content from PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and archives. Flexible options allow precise document structuring.

feature_2.title: Page organization
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages within documents by moving, swapping, or deleting them as needed.

feature_3.title: Adjust page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape modes.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate documents
feature_4.content: Select and extract pages, saving them as independent files.

formats.title: Rearrange pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, providing a flexible solution for document organization.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Explore additional powerful capabilities of our solution.

examples.comment_1: Initialize a {{NameProduct}} object with the source document path
examples.comment_2: Select the page to be moved

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to move pages within {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Upgrade your {{EnvName}} applications with advanced document management features.
content.step_1: Provide the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Select the page number and specify its new position.

code_1.title: Move a page to the last position in a document
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to move a specific page to the end of a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_2: Retrieve document details and determine the last page number
code_1.comment_3: Configure options with the target page numbers
